description: The Frozen Cucumber Mojito is a summer cocktail that is perfect for hot days. The invigorating taste of cucumber is combined with the sweetness of mint and the kick of rum to create a drink that is both delicious and dangerous.The frozen cucumber helps to keep the drink cold and exhilarating, while the mint provides a soothing flavor that helps to cut through the heat.The rum adds an extra level of sweetness and depth of flavor, making this cocktail a Frozen Cucumber Mojito. If you're looking for a summer cocktail that is both delicious yet light, the Frozen Cucumber Mojito is a perfect choice.
name: Frozen Cucumber Mojito
recipeIngredient: 1 pc. English cucumber, washed and sliced

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend on high speed until mixed.
recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high speed until mixed.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve in glassware of choice. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.text: Serve in glassware of choice. Enjoy!
